Welcome to **buildpy-server's**' documentation!
===============================================

Buildpy-Server is a small and reliable build server.

---------

Feedback
--------

If you have any suggestions or questions about **buildpy-server** feel
free to email me at maiksensi[a t]gmail.com.

If you encounter any errors or problems with **buildpy-server**,
please let me know!

Open an Issue at the GitHub https://github.com/buildpy/buildpy-server
main repository.
